recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions
2. Fry bacon until crispy
3. Beat eggs with parmesan and black pepper
4. Mix everything together while pasta is hot

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook rice according to package instructions
2. Stir fry vegetables with garlic
3. Add soy sauce and mix with rice

recipes.name: Chicken Salad
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook and shred chicken breast
2. Chop vegetables
3. Mix with olive oil and lemon juice
